title: preissig font
content:
hi!  
exist a free font similar to preissig roman or antikva, like this? thanx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607102018im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Dream%20Evil%20-%20Gold%20Medal%20In%20Metal_3506.jpg)
author: rockberto

comments.content: This looks like an artificially bolded [P22 Preissig Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607102018/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/p22/p22_preissig_roman/). Nothing free quite like it, but it’s only $20.

Stephen, I respect Richard, but his version of Preissig is really poor. I recomended Storm’s version. At least is cheapen.

[http://www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/families-39-preissig](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607102018/http:/www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/families-39-preissig "http://www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/families-39-preissig")
